column5: to men were reportedly drugged by two unknown women who put sleeping pills in their drinks. The incident occurred in a beer garden/snack hut in Village 7
column8: the two victims began chatting up two beautiful girls
column9: who agreed to go and drink beer together. After several rounds of drinks both men fell unconscious. When one man woke up at about 6 pm
column11: his jewelry was missing. His drinking partner was still asleep and could not be woken
column12: so the shop owner reported to the authorities to come down to the location to intervene. ------POST NEWS
